repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:jessie 
# MAINTAINER digmore 
RUN apt-get update \  
&& DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \  
build-essential \  
libpcre3 \  
libpcre3-dev \  
python-dev \  
python-pip \  
python-psycopg2 \  
&& rm -fr /var/lib/apt/lists/* \  
&& rm -fr /tmp/* \  
&& rm -fr /var/tmp/* 

# Set up package and requirements 
RUN mkdir -p /opt/django 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir django uwsgi whitenoise
COPY uwsgi.ini /etc/uwsgi.ini 

EXPOSE 8080 9191 
ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/local/bin/uwsgi", "/etc/uwsgi.ini"]
